column4: hi there has anyone managed to get a radeon 9600 acelerated in dapper?
wastrel did you have to do anything special to get it to work? my 9600pro doesn't seem to want to get acelerated... it keeps giving me mesa :S
wastrel I'm following the xgl how to
I said it right from the start LOL
Cafuego I've had my card for over 1 year... I wasn't even using linux LOL
I changed the driver in xorg.conf, rebooted, restarted x, restarted gmd and reinstalled the driver in-between... nothing seems to get my radeon acelerated :S
btw from 9300 above the proceadure is diferent tuxcicles
and strangely enough the 9600 series is giving the hardest time :|
don't blame the hardware if the software doesn't work :P
actually, it is ATI the companies fault for crafting horrendous drivers
who do you think wrote those closed fglrx drivers?
true but I just love ati cards in both windows and mac :P
zealot I see. suffer by your faith then. :P
no you wouldn't. it runs on Intel
